title: 60% of  U.S. Twitter users took breaks from it in the past year
description: A quarter of the Pew Research Center's study participants say they will not likely use Twitter a year from now.

title: Most Americans think AI threatens humanity, according to a poll
Nearly 60% of workers believe AI could help prevent burnout
description: How can we prevent burnout? It's an age-old question in the workplace. This survey says artificial intelligence could be the answer.

title: Apple just released iOS 16.5 for the iPhone. Here's what's new
description: As is usually the case when Apple releases a software update, it's time to update all of your Apple devices, not just your iPhone.

title: OpenAI just released an official ChatGPT app for the iPhone
description: The free iOS app lets you speak your queries via voice recognition and syncs your ChatGPT history across your devices.

title: The best Father's Day gift cards in 2023
description: Don't know what to get your dad for Father's Day? A gift card is never a bad option. Here are some of the best ones your dad might like.

title: Can your smart hub do this? Samsung's $59 SmartThings Station innovates where it matters
description: Why don't more smart hubs have this power feature?

title: Meta unveils its first custom AI chip
description: The circuits come with software optimized to run PyTorch, and emphasize the task of making recommendations.

title: Can Montana really ban TikTok? Here's what to know about its new law
description: Montana becomes the first U.S. state to ban TikTok. Here's why and when the new law takes effect.

title: Now you can access Bing Chat without a Microsoft account
description: Microsoft is rolling out a new feature that would allow all users to access its AI chatbot -- but there's a catch.

title: How to add special characters in Google Docs and LibreOffice
description: When you need to add accents or other special characters in your Google or LibreOffice documents, you'll be surprised at how easy it is.

title: How I modded an Amazon Ring camera to monitor hazardous tech in my workshop
description: In one room I have a robot-controlled laser beam that can slice through most materials, and in another, I have a robot-controlled spinning wheel of death.

title: ChatGPT outperforms money managers? What to know before taking AI investing advice
description: Americans are flocking to generative AI for stock market advice, and turning the investing world upside down.

title: How to password-protect a file in Apple Pages (and when you might want to)
description: If you work with documents in Apple Pages that contain sensitive information, you might want to consider locking those documents behind a password.

title: Samsung starts mass production of advanced 12nm DDR5 DRAM
description: Samsung is affirming its memory chip dominance through the launch amid the downturn in the chip market.
